title: Minimalist Solid Brown Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a minimalist solid brown midi dress, A-line silhouette, short sleeves, crew neckline, soft matte cotton twill fabric, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and clean hems, no model, no mannequin
techpack: A-line midi dress in solid chocolate brown cotton twill with polyester blend lining. Short sleeves, crew neckline, invisible back zipper closure, self-fabric waist belt. Topstitching detail along neckline and hem. Regular fit with clean minimalist finish.
provenance: Designed based on combination of brown color palette and solid/minimalist trend.
design_text:
Minimalist Solid Brown Midi Dress (BRN-SLD-001)
Colors: chocolate brown, warm taupe, espresso
Fabrics: cotton twill, polyester blend lining
Prints/Patterns: solid
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short sleeves
Neckline: crew neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: invisible back zipper, topstitching along neckline and hem, self-fabric waist belt
Techpack: available
